content: Guarding the Shrine is another Dual-Blade Monk, who thankfully won't respawn when killed, so feel free to go all out with your spells to overpower him after deflecting an attack to stagger him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Guarding the Shrine is another Dual-Blade Monk, who thankfully won't respawn when killed, so feel free to go all out with your spells to overpower him after deflecting an attack to stagger him.
